t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I knew you wanted to cry.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I live with my own hair and have no problems with it, aside from being heavy and requiring lots of care.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu won't likely live with this hair though.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't talk anymore, but you still won't brave the tower.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not leaving once I find a solution. Reimu can't stand seeing herself like this.
